content.question: Since 1960 Brazil, Kazakhstan, Myanmar, Pakistan, and Tanzania have relocated their capital cities . Which of the following statements about the new locations is true for all five countries?

choices.label: A militarily strategic location was chosen .
An ethnically mixed location was chosen .
A more central location was chosen .

content.answer: A more central location was chosen .
